name: Frogge!
description:
Frogge! is a 2D platformer following the adventures of an intrepid frog. Brave the dangers of the jungle to rescue your froggy friend from an abduction by aliens! Avoid enemies (or squish them) and use your tongue to collect flies and swing across platforms. Hop to it! 🐸

Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move horizontally
  • Point and click with mouse to shoot tongue (grapple and collect flies)
  • Space to jump and release grapple
  • Scroll wheel to extend and retract tongue when grappling
Acknowledgements

Developers: Kaiden, Connie, Cat, and Ralph

Made for ISTA 451/INFO 551, Fall 2022, The University of Arizona, taught by Drew Castalia
